We may ask advertisers or other partners to serve ads or services to your devices, which may use cookies or similar technologies placed by us or the third party.

We also may share your information as well as information from tools like cookies, log files, and device identifiers and location data, with third-party organizations that help us provide the Service to you ("Service Providers")
This information would allow third-party ad networks to, among other things, deliver targeted advertisements that they believe will be of most interest to you.
